Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I install apps on phone without using the Android Market?  I am trying to install APK files which are not downloaded from Android Play/Market and they are not installing and giving error message - can not install APK which are not downloaded from Android Market.I thought I need to Root my tablet to install these APKs.But  Iam not able to root my Coby Kyros - mid7016 Tablet with Z4ROOT.Can you please suggest me good options? suggestions? if any one has done already.
Title: How to root Coby Kyros - mid7016 tablet

history.Text: I am trying to install APK files which are not downloaded from Android Play/Market and they are not installing and giving error message - can not install APK which are not downloaded from Android Market.I thought I need to Root my tablet to install these APKs.But  Iam not able to root my Coby Kyros - mid7016 Tablet with Z4ROOT.Can you please suggest me good options? suggestions? if any one has done already.
